name: Advanced Blackjack
overview: Advanced Blackjack is a blackjack simulator and teaching tool for the Apple II. Designed to teach a player to improve their blackjack skills, the program allows the player to practice betting, counting cards, or a focus on difficult hands. The player is also able to play a blackjack game against the computer, or have the computer play for them. The computer can also assist the player by telling them the ideal play in each situation, and only allowing them to play the best moves. The player can also receive a summary of their total blackjack performance.
